OH MY!  What an incredible game! 5stars plus 20 for good measure. Nice on iPhone, MUCH better on iPad Air 1. Even better on iPad Air 2 because the graphics are easier on eyes which makes targeting easier. For the hours of enjoyment I have received, it is MORE than worth the small amount the game costs.
This game is overall a great game. The wide airplane selection, the graphics, the fun online multiplayer, and the campaign are all great features of this game

Have had all Revo / Sky Gamblers since release - i.e., years.  Over past many months, crashes without exception, every session. Play every day, primarily defend the base or campaign. Have all updates applied, current iOS, iPad 3 with 64 mem.   Even wiped all apps, content, reinstalled - so much do I enjoy these - to attempt resolution. Has gone from ideal game(s) to unusable. Now instead of hours play, must sessions, okay until crash and give it up.
Who QA this SW?  It crashes constantly. So frustrating. I want my $ back. It's ridiculously. Not playable at all.

I love every aspect of this game. From stunning graphics to the amazing single player options and spectacular multiplayer. If u hadn't brought this game I will greatly advise u to do so . Only reason this is a 4 star is because u unlock the best planes after u finish the whole campaign. This game is much better than its successor ( check out SKY GAMBLERS ) due to the player having more control in every single aspect. I highly recommend this game to everyone . Hope this helpsüòã...

I love sky gamblers Storm Raiders because I love WW2 but as much as I like WW2 planes flying around in modern jets is more fun. I like the 4th generation jets they have great damage. I would recommend this game over any sky gamblers even if you like WW2 planes better then modern. It's just more fun with modern jets end of story.
Game is really cool and good. Haven't seen any bugs in the game yet worth the money I paid for it.

title.label: Good game, but needs some fixes.

content.label: The gameplay is nice, but not smooth on retina iPad mini. There are some lag issues and frame rate drops that ruin the flight experience. Graphics are beautiful, however needs some more texture. Although plays smoothly on iPhone 5s resolution, I enjoy playing on a bigger screen. Please update and optimize for iPad mini retina.
Very fun!

I've been playing PC flight sim & flight combat games for many years.  The interface & controls in this game, as well as flight dynamics, are nearly perfect for the iPhone.  The acrobatic combat maneuvers should be expanded, though.
Better than MetalStorm and X Invasion. It is a good game. Highly recommend!
